msbt.message: Quick, there's no time to explain. Can I stop by your place, like, RIGHT NOW?
Sure! Come on by!
It's not a good time. Sorry, not now.
Alright, , here's the plan.I come over to your place and we yak at each other for a while. Sound groovy?
Sure! Come on by!
Uh, what? Nah, not right now.
Would it be too presumptuous of me to invite myself over to your place? Sayright now? Because that's what I'm doing.
Sure! Come on by!
Oh, sorry. Not now. Maybe another time.
Eh, I get it. You want some notice before company. Well, invite me over another time when you're ready!
No worries. When you're ready for the full extravaganza, give me a shout!
Hey, no problem. Timing is everything, eh?
! Alright, so are we talking right now, or
Right now!
How about tomorrow?
Muchas gracias, mon ami! That's German for "sweet deal, bro!"Anyway, so when are we doing this? Right now or what?
Right now!
How about tomorrow?
Niiiiice. Oh, so is right now a great time, or only a pretty good time for a visit?
It's a great time!
How about tomorrow?
Alright! And away we go—straight to the House of !
Well, what are we waiting for? Let's get going!
The time is now. Let's get moving!
You know it occurs to me that I've never been to your place beforeMy nervous energy right now could power a light bulb!
Wait, I just realized that I've never been to your place before.This is a big occasion—my first visit! We need to get commemorative T-shirts made or something.
Wait a secondit's way too late for something like this.Sorry, . I'll have to take a rain check.
Alright, tomorrow it is. Get ready, , because I'll be comin' in hot!
Works for me. Don't forget! I'll be there rain or shine!
Roger that! I'll be there with bells on!
I'll be there bright and early. Wouldn't want to bug you by showing up too late!
Now, what's your dress code like?I'm just kidding! You know I'll be decked out to the nines!
I won't be able to sit still, knowing that we've got a visit coming up. So I'll come a-knockin' pretty early!
Wait, so I've never been to your place beforeWell, don't get ready for me or anything. I want to see your natural, undisturbed habitat!
You know what? I've never actually been to your place before!Now I'm getting all nervous I feel like it's my first day on set, or my first time walking the runway
I'm coming over to visit tomorrow, remember? I'll be there early, so get ready for !
I made plans to barge into your home at some undetermined time tomorrow, remember? You're still down, right?
Ugh, it's STILL not tomorrow? I'm so excited to visit your place, I feel like it's a holiday!
Don't think, just answer as fast as you can—can I come over to your place and hang out right now?
Do I have a choice?
I'm kind of busy...

Oh man You know that feeling, after you stay up all night talking with friends and then it gets quiet? And you just want to keep talking and hanging out?Unrelated, what are you doing right now? Can I come over?
Sure, why not?
Sorry, not now.
Alright, alright. It was worth a shot. Another time!
No, no, that's fine. Sometimes I need to just be by myself anyway.I'll put on some acid jazz and spend hours . It's called self-care!
